plain_text:
--- PAGE 1 ---
List of categories where trials are allowed:
 Simulators
 Ship's propulsion machinery, radars and sensors, naviga(cid:415)on equipment, communica(cid:415)on equipment, RO
plants, compressors, cranes, boats, Pilotless Target aircra(cid:332), pumps, dehumidifiers etc.
 Aircra(cid:332) engine/generator/flight deck equipment/air condi(cid:415)oning system/radars
 Tank engine/ generator/ air condi(cid:415)oning system
 Bullet Proof Helmet, Bullet Resistance Jacket
 Drones
 All-Terrain Vehicles (ATV)
 Communica(cid:415)on Equipment for Defense:
Radio Sets:
o HF/VHF/FM Manpack Radio
o Vehicle Radio Set
Tac(cid:415)cal Communica(cid:415)on Systems:
o So(cid:332)ware Defined Radio (SDR) Systems
o VHF/UHF Tac(cid:415)cal Communica(cid:415)on Systems
o Handheld Satellite Phones (e.g., Iridium)
o Combat Net Radio (CNR) Systems
Satellite Communica(cid:415)on Systems:
o Very Small Aperture Terminal (VSAT) Systems
o Satellite Phones
o Mobile Satellite Communica(cid:415)on Systems
Command and Control Systems:
o Ba(cid:425)lefield Management Systems (BMS)
o Tac(cid:415)cal Data Links
o Encryp(cid:415)on Devices (e.g., VINBAX)
o Surveillance and Reconnaissance Communica(cid:415)on:
o Unmanned Aerial Vehicle (UAV) Communica(cid:415)on Systems
o Ground Control Sta(cid:415)ons (GCS) for UAVs
o Remote Video Terminals (RVTs)
Electronic Warfare (EW) Communica(cid:415)on:
o EW Communica(cid:415)on Jamming Systems
o Communica(cid:415)on Intelligence (COMINT) Systems
Network Infrastructure:
o Field Deployable Communica(cid:415)on Nodes
o Tac(cid:415)cal Communica(cid:415)on Switches
o Mobile Communica(cid:415)on Shelters
Naviga(cid:415)on and Posi(cid:415)oning Systems:
o GPS Receivers
o Naviga(cid:415)on Systems for Vehicles and Personnel
Specialized Communica(cid:415)on Equipment:
o Underwater Communica(cid:415)on Systems
o Special Forces Communica(cid:415)on Gear
o Mountain Warfare Communica(cid:415)on Equipment
 Contamina(cid:415)on Monitor

--- PAGE 2 ---
 Fiber Reinforced Plas(cid:415)c Boat with Motor (RIBs)
 Bukhari Improved Version
 Fire Figh(cid:415)ng Equipment's as per DGQA specifica(cid:415)ons
 Vic(cid:415)m Loca(cid:415)on System with Breaching System
 HDPE Boats
 Pontoon Boats
 Medical equipment
 Engineering and Mining Equipment for Bomb Disposal Units:
 Modular protec(cid:415)on vehicles
 High Al(cid:415)tude Clothing including Snow Boots

bullets: Aircraft and tank engines, generators, and air conditioning systems
Various communication equipment including radios and satellite systems
Command and control systems with encryption and surveillance capabilities
Navigation systems for vehicles and personnel
Specialized communication equipment for underwater and mountain warfare
Fiber reinforced plastic boats and other marine equipment
Firefighting equipment and victim location systems
Medical and engineering equipment for bomb disposal
Modular protection vehicles and high altitude clothing
ai_summary.summary: The document outlines various categories where trials are permitted, focusing on defense and specialized equipment. It includes simulators, propulsion machinery, and communication systems for defense, such as radios and satellite communication. Additionally, it covers navigation systems, electronic warfare communication, and specialized equipment for underwater and mountain operations. Other categories include contamination monitors, marine equipment, firefighting tools, medical and engineering equipment for bomb disposal, and protective clothing for high altitudes.
